description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to specify if this service request is the first or last service request in a cyclic series of service requests. Used in the Timing/Quantity Relationship (TQ2) segment in HL7 Version 2.x messaging.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0505 (Cyclic Entry/Exit Indicator)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license.html

description.value: A code that indicates the status of the concept
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

definition.value: The first service request in a cyclic group
The last service request in a cyclic group

display.value: The first service request in a cyclic group

definition.value: The first service request in a cyclic group

valueString.value: Retired March 2016. Use code F instead

display.value: The last service request in a cyclic group.

definition.value: The last service request in a cyclic group.

valueString.value: Retired March 2016. Use code L instead
